text: Ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Moses Osirizir Araziba fofozimɨn mɨngarir aghuim ko guizɨn akaba bar e ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn ia ghaze, e gumazir damazir okaviziba tuavim men akakasi. Egha mɨtatemɨn itir gumazamiziba, angazangarim men akakasi. Egha gumazamizir onganiba fofozim me ganɨga, egha borir doziba men sure gami.
